21 #ifndef DBUSCXX_HEADERLOG_H
22 #define DBUSCXX_HEADERLOG_H
23 
24 #include <sstream>
25 #include <dbus-cxx/simplelogger_defs.h>
26 
27 extern simplelogger_log_function dbuscxx_log_function;
28 
29 #define DBUSCXX_LOG_CSTR_HEADER( logger, message, level ) do{\
30  if( !dbuscxx_log_function ) break;\
31  struct SL_LogLocation location;\
32  location.line_number = __LINE__;\
33  location.file = __FILE__;\
34  location.function = __func__;\
35  dbuscxx_log_function( logger, &location, level, message );\
36  } while(0)
37 
38 #define DBUSCXX_DEBUG_STDSTR( logger, message ) do{\
39  std::stringstream stream;\
40  stream << message;\
41  DBUSCXX_LOG_CSTR_HEADER( logger, stream.str().c_str(), SL_DEBUG);\
42  } while(0)
43 
44 #endif
simplelogger_log_function
void(* simplelogger_log_function)(const char *logger_name, const struct SL_LogLocation *location, const enum SL_LogLevel level, const char *log_string)
Pointer to a function that does the actual log operation.
